message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1200000 price point. I would like to propose an offer of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1050000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose an offer of $1000000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go below $1100000, Bob. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise again, though. I'm counteroffering at $1075000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1050000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go below $1100000, Bob. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise again, though. I'm counteroffering at $1075000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. However, I am unable to exceed my budget limit. I would like to propose one last offer of $1050000 for the product.
